comments: He was a former Marine and as a result, he expects similar discipline from his students will make modifications if the needs are legitimate but gets angry and goes into drill Sergeant mode over the stupidest stuff.

His military background shows at times (short temper, low patience) and his teaching sometimes is not the most comprehensive. His directions are also confusing at times. Better to take him than Wilson because workload is so much less but if you can avoid the class all together, do it.

I had Roeper for 205 and 375...i freaking love Roeper...he\'s so cool..he wrote my recommendations for my internship...at first i didnt but now we\'re cool on a first name basis. you gotta get cool with Roeper..but don\'t sleep on him.. if u do your work and on time you should pass I got B\'s in both classes
I liked him. I know some don\'t. But I thought his class was fair and he did just fine. I\'d take him again.

I would never take him again even if he was my last resort. He is rude and is terrible at teaching. He says to ask questions, but when you do he tries to make you look dumb. He has an attitude and always thinks he is right. The class was pretty easy, but he makes it miserable. He also takes points off for the stupidest things. I do suggest taking h

I\'m not sure why everybody is being so critical of him. To me he was a very cool guy who kept his opinions to himself and tried to get the class to participate. The only time he would get upset in class is when the same people would constantly be late. If you\'re not a slacker, I\'m sure you\'ll enjoy his classes.

I got a B in this class and this class was useful but he wasn\'t a good teacher. He gets mad at stupid stuff and he isn\'t that organzied. He can be a big jerk for no reason and he\'s really arrogant. I wouldn\'t take him again.

yea the first comment is pretty much right, he is really opinionated but it doesnt get in the way of his teaching, he tries to get convo out the class but doesnt seem to know how. he is a kool person but i dnt think teaching is for him. he gives like 3 tests, they are complicated in their format, but overall pretty easy.
Awful at facilitating conversation, even though he wants it in class. EXTREMELY opinionated. Couldn\'t even stand being in class, let alone participate.
